tag_list: git-system, sukhi-canada, sukhi-bc, sukhi-sihota, sahota-sukhi, asian-weddings
overview: Sukhi leads the entire team to success. His experience in media relations, networking, and sales makes for the fast paced environment in which this team operates. Born in Punjab, Sukhi made his way up the corporate ladder and with his vision, built this company from the ground up. His extreme dedication to his clients and employees are why this company has grown by leaps and bounds in such a short time.
